row.entry: Frequent error in log: ControlCenter.GetRunningServices timedout waiting for reply
Logging turned on by debug does not turn off.
Insecure Cipher RC4 is enabled on version 1.2.x.
Entering HTML code longer than 16 characters in the interface text field generates an error message, however the code is executed.
Use of special characters in the Edit Service form can cause errors.
Entering HTML code in the Public Endpoint host text field generates an error message, however the code is executed.
Application configurations cannot be edited if more than 10 configurations are defined in the application template.
When using file-tab completion, serviced executes the incomplete command.
